text: Hasan Muratović (11 April 1940 – 14 November 2020) was a Bosnian politician, entrepreneur and professor. He was the 4th and last Prime Minister of the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina from 30 January 1996 to 3 January 1997. Muratović died on 14 November 2020, in Sarajevo from COVID-19 during its pandemic in Bosnia and Herzegovina at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina businesspeople Category:Yugoslavian academics Category:Prime Ministers of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: Hasan Muratović
